inclusion.criterion: Biochemical progression after definitive surgery or radiation
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Negative CT scan/MRI and Tc99 bone scan for metastatic prostate cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of findings on PET scan suspicious for metastatic prostate cancer in bone
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recovery from acute toxicity related to prior therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hematological eligibility parameters (within 16 days before treatment initiation)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatic function eligibility parameters (within 16 days before treatment initiation)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal function defined by eGFR within normal as predicted by the CKD-EPI equation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No other active malignancies within 36 months of treatment initiation
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with immunocompromised status due to Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infection or other immunodeficiency diseases
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Chronic administration of systemic corticosteroids within 28 days of treatment initiation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of any organ transplantation, including allogeneic stem-cell transplantation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of prior systemic therapy with radionuclides (e.g., strontium-89, samarium-153, rhenium-186, rhenium-188, or radium 223 dichloride)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of an investigational agent within 28 days (or 56 days for an antibody-based therapy) of treatment initiation
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a history of acute urinary retention and prostate cancer. He meets most inclusion criteria but has a history of prior chemotherapy, which triggers exclusion.
